title: Sans serif for new catalogue for a cosmetic/beauty care brand
content:
Hi everyone!

We are going to start a new catalogue for a cosmetic/beauty care brand.  
We will go on a ligth sans serif, with high x-heigth for the main articles description.  
The pages will have some background pictures (usualy ligth colors)- so we need a ligth sans with some "strength".  
We are considering Koz Gothic for this.  
Do you guys have some considerations to make? Suggestions and some serif pair? "Good examples"?

António FOnseca
author: afonseca1974
